Section Header: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
Field Label: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, More than half the days | 3, Nearly every day
0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, More than half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, More than half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: Feeling tired or having little energy
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, More than half the days | 3, Nearly every day
0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, More than half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: Feeling bad about yourself — or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, More than half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, More than half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite — being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, More than half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, More than half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Section Header: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you?
Field Label: How difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not difficult at all | 1, Somewhat difficult | 2, Very difficult | 3, Extremely difficult
